title: Sell Chateau Latour
metaDescription: Sell your Chateau Latour. We buy Grand Vin, Les Forts de Latour, and Pauillac de Latour. Direct offers for First Growth Bordeaux.
heroSubhead: We buy Chateau Latour and Les Forts de Latour.
introParagraph: Chateau Latour is known for its consistency and power. As a First Growth Bordeaux, it is a staple of any serious collection. We purchase the Grand Vin, the second wine Les Forts de Latour, and the third wine Pauillac de Latour. Sell your ex-chateau releases or aged cellar treasures directly.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Bottles with signs of heat damage (seepage)
conditionFactors: Fill level (Latour ages very slowly, good fills expected)
pricingFactors: Ex-Chateau release (recent library releases command a premium)

faqs.question: What is Les Forts de Latour?
faqs.answer: It is the second wine of the estate. It is highly regarded and often outperforms other classified growths.

faqs.question: Do you buy recent releases?
faqs.answer: Latour left the En Primeur system in 2012 and releases wines only when ready to drink. We buy these new releases.

faqs.question: Is the 1961 vintage valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, Latour 1961 is considered a perfect wine and is extremely valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy Pauillac de Latour?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the third wine of the estate as well.

faqs.question: How do I verify authenticity?
faqs.answer: Newer bottles have a Prooftag seal on the capsule. Do not remove or damage this seal.

faqs.question: How do I ship wood cases?
faqs.answer: Strap or tape the wood case securely, but place it inside a cardboard shipping box with padding. Do not ship the wood case naked.
